tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My best ever experience in hospital/clinic. Doctor and all the staff are very friendly and helpful.  Easy to find the location, clinic was neat and clean.I already booked my appointment so I don't have to wait and charges was also reasonable. Thank you so much guys for your support

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I recently had a deep cleaning with laser session at Galaxy Dental Care Kondapur, and I am incredibly impressed with the entire experience. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and professional, which immediately put me at ease.
I was also pleased with the modern equipment and clean, calming environment of the clinic. The dentist took the time to discuss the results with me afterward, providing helpful tips for maintaining my oral health.
and while the cost was higher than I initially expected. It cost me 8K for deep cleaning and asked 6K for Wisdom Tooth Removal, However in my native place it cost around 2k to 3k for deep cleaning.
